trans-unit.source: Displays the Customize Toolbar dialog box

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Customize Toolbar dialog box

target.mrk: Displays the Customize Toolbar dialog box

trans-unit.source: The toolbar must handle the $TBN_QUERYINSERT and $TBN_QUERYDELETE notifications for the Customize Toolbar dialog box to appear.

seg-source.mrk: The toolbar must handle the $TBN_QUERYINSERT and $TBN_QUERYDELETE notifications for the Customize Toolbar dialog box to appear.

target.mrk: The toolbar must handle the $TBN_QUERYINSERT and $TBN_QUERYDELETE notifications for the Customize Toolbar dialog box to appear.

trans-unit.source: If the toolbar does not handle those notifications, $TB_CUSTOMIZE has no effect.

seg-source.mrk: If the toolbar does not handle those notifications, $TB_CUSTOMIZE has no effect.

target.mrk: If the toolbar does not handle those notifications, $TB_CUSTOMIZE has no effect.
